storageAreaList.name: RAM
storageAreaList.description: The module stores ephemeral SSPs in RAM provided by the operational environment. The operating system protects all SSPs through memory separation and protection mechanisms. No process other than the module itself can access the SSPs in its process memory.

sspZeroizationList.description: SSPs are zeroized when the appropriate context object is destroyed.
SSPs are zeroized when system is powered down.
sspZeroizationList.rationale: SSPs are zeroized when system is powered down.

sspZeroizationList.description: Intermediate keygen values are zeroized before the module returns from the key generation function.
sspZeroizationList.rationale: Intermediate keygen values are zeroized before the module returns from the key generation function.
